name: Dayuh House
address: 7GGG+QFC, Baledan, Klumpu, Kec. Nusa Penida, Kabupaten Klungkung, Bali 80771, Indonesia
review 1: I had an excellent stay here. The view is great with the sea and mountains in the distance, and the atmosphere is very peaceful. The AC is nice and cool and the water nice and warm. Owner is also kind and helpful. Easy to walk to a few nearby restaurants serving Indonesian food and convenient central location to quickly reach most locations on the island. Good internet access.
review 2: Good accommodations in the middle of the island, the room are clean and nice. The owner it's a wonderfull and nice person, the breakfast it's amazing!  You have also a really nice view from the room on the Bali island and Batur mont sometimes really beautiful
review 3: Super nice homestay, especially considering what you pay! Staff is friendly and helped me when I got ‚ÄúBali Belly‚Äù (not from the hostel food), as well as let us check out late. Rooms are clean and well kept, and they also clean them every day. Nice view from the balcony. Only downside is that the location requires motorbikes to get anywhere - if you (like me) likes riding motorbikes, the location is actually better than most since it‚Äôs easy to get anywhere on the island. Otherwise be prepared that you will need to get a cab to get dinner!
review 4: I really enjoyed my time here. The place is really nice and clean. The lady is really helpfull with everything and kind. Just one negative thing, the bathroom smells bad sometimes. Also you have to rent a scooter otherwise it will be really really hard to reach there.
review 5: Great to stay for a few days, but you will need a motorbike to get around the island. Clean rooms, breakfast included and great view. A few food places nearby and a good spot to reach anywhere on the island.

name: Bhavana Cottage
address: Baledan, Klumpu, Kec. Nusa Penida, Kabupaten Klungkung, Bali 80771, Indonesia
review 1:
Not too far but not too close, my fav is the bed, balcony and the owner. He handle us really friendly and super nice, sadly we can‚Äôt have 2 extra bed but he not charge the thrid person in the room and still serve breakfast for my friend.
They have TV, water heater, small pool with 3 sunbed, balcony with chair and table in each room, kitchen and 2 medium table for enjoy our meal, parking lot fit for 1 car and 6 bike, tradisional mart next to the accomodation ‚ú®
review 2: The location is in the center of the nusa penida island makes you more strategic to tourist attractions. The vibes is good, it has pool, enough for a resting place to explore the nusa penida island.
review 3: I didn't stay in this accommodation. I left more than a dozen calls and text messages during the trip and forced them to use the pick-up. I suddenly changed his attitude, saying that the reservation was already full-booked because i didnt accept their offer. The pick-up price was too much. I suddenly lost my place to sleep on my way to the hotel at 8 p.m. I spent 3 hours looking for accommodation in Nusa Penida during the peak season. They force us expensive pickups with using the payment system at the accommodation. If i need proof, I will attach the conversation we had in whatsapp.
review 4:
Locality is good.
Swimming pool is compact and good.
Place is well maintained.

Some basic amenities in the room can be added like a kettle, cupboard was not maintained and has less space to store things.

Overall it is good to stay.
review 5: great service and atmosphere! they have a corn farm, but i'm not sure if you're allowed to grill it... maybe just ask? the staff is so friendly and genuine!

name: The Sabho Garden
address: Baledan, Klumpu, Kec. Nusa Penida, Kabupaten Klungkung, Bali 80771, Indonesia
review 1: Lovely and quiet place with a nice view. Family-owned, the staff is super nice. If you‚Äôre looking for a peaceful stay, this area is way better than the noisy harbor. Due to its central, elevated position, besides the ocean view you also get the ability to explore every part of the island more easily.
review 2:
Lovely family-owned accommodation. Clean and tidy room, cold & hot shower. The location is great if planning to visit the whole island because although you have to drive everywhere it‚Äôs just 15-30 min to the N,E,S and W.
Really peaceful and quiet environment. We rented a scooter and managed to travel around easily.
review 3: My friends and I (we were a group of 6) booked 4 rooms in this place. Before getting there, I have been in touch with the host for some concerns and they were very respnsive and accommodating. When we arrived at the place, we were surprised to find that there were actually just four rooms and we ended up having the entire place all to ourselves!! Which was exactly what we initially wanted since we all wanted to rent an exclusive villa but realized it wont be worth it for a short stay. The rooms were spacious with high ceiling, comfy huge beds and a nice pool overlooking the mountains. We went about nusa pineda on a motorbike and got back pretty late at our accommodation and since there were no nearby warungs, the host agreed to cook us dinner even though they only usually serve food for breakfast when she learned that we missed dinner and most places are already closed. Her name is Ari and she is a very nice girl and helped us during our stay with anything. The place is located at the center of Nusa Pineda so it was convenient for us to go around and see around. I would totally recommend this place even more so if you are a group and wants to have the place all to your selves.
review 4:
I paid 196K for 1 night, booked with Agoda. And I was along there üòÅüëå The guesthouse is quite close to the road, which is a bit annoying, but it was quiet at night.

AC, and cold shower üöø was okay üëç

The pool was a bit cloudy but still okay üëç

Not many Warungs near it ü§∑
review 5: Very beautiful and calm guest house. The lady is super nice, she took good care of us, she makes the most delicious breakfasts and is always willing to help no matter the issue. Definitely recommend!

name: Warung Liang Sunset Hill
address: banjar baledan, Kec. Nusa Penida, Kabupaten Klungkung, Bali 80771, Indonesia
review 1:
We ordered grilled fish and green salad which are veeery tasty. ( banana fritters were also yummy! )
The place is also a great sunset point!
Highly recommended!
review 2: The quality of the food was very good and the preparation time was short. Only the chairs are annoying to sit on.
review 3: The food was great and the service also very good! Can 100% recommend :)
review 4: Nice place, nothing special, except for the view. Ok food for a cheap price, just what I was looking for.
review 5: The food was amazing and fresh, with very good prices, good quantity and a nice and comfy atmosphere. The view of the hill is thrilling

name: Ramp Cottage
address: Baledan, Nusa Penida Nusa Penida, Klumpu, Kec. Nusa Penida, Kabupaten Klungkung, Bali 80771, Indonesia
review 1:
This cottage located in the middle of the island and it is very easy access all the attractions.
The cottages are very cozy and comfortable. I stayed 3days with my husband and my experience was amazing.
The owner family is very supportive and humble. You can arrange scooter or taxi with them.
You will get the best breakfast from them.
I had a relaxed and peaceful 3 days here.....
review 2: This is a nice cottage that I ever visited. The view from this cottage is very beautiful. We can see the sunrise and sunset from our room. The facilities are also good. We feel so confortable. The services are also nice. We really enjoyed our stay.
review 3: Nice one.picturesque surroundings,  The hosts were incredibly welcoming.
review 4:
Nice place but frequently electricity disconnect
Also the place is quiet remote and far from everything
review 5:
Very good Staff and good clean rooms.
Amazing View for Sunset

name: Waroeng Home Nyaman Ibe
address: 7GHG+JXH, Jl. Raya Jungutbatu, Klumpu, Kec. Nusa Penida, Kabupaten Klungkung, Bali 80771, Indonesia
review 1:
I passed by here randomly while heading north west from the south west of the island. It was around 2pm and there was nobody besides few local guys chit chatting.
The food the lady prepared to me at the moment had an amazing taste and, even if she was not speaking English, she was smiling with her eyes and in a very kind way.
There are few dishes in the menu, those I tried were really really tasty. Ended up spending 90k IDR for 2 dishes, 2 cokes and 1 bottled water.
Definitely suggested if you happen to pass by this place!
review 2: I spent two whole months almost eating dinner daily here - the ladies at the shop do not speak English very well, but they are so caring and kind, and always greeted me with a smile! Besides that, the mie goreng here is the best I've eaten in Indonesia üôè
review 3:
Good sambal to begin with.
Food was tasty and service was good.
review 4: Tiny restaurant, but had really yummy cheap food, great service and the sambal game was on point
review 5: Mini Restaurant, but have Good Food and Good Place

name: Lumbung Garden
address: 7GGG+9MM, Klumpu, Nusa Penida, Klungkung Regency, Bali 80771, Indonesia

name: Kedai Purnama
address: 7GHG+2P6, Br. Baledan, Klumpu, Kec. Nusa Penida, Kabupaten Klungkung, Bali 80771, Indonesia
review 1: This place is a hidden gem! The food is top of the line. Nasi Goreng! Mie Goreng. Fried Chicken!! OMG! We had eaten in lots of fancy restaurant in the tourist area, city or main streets but Kedai is the best! During our stay in Nusa Penida, everyday we are here enjoying the ambiance, the hospitality and the great tasting food. It is also very cheap. Prices are wayyyy lower compare to similar establishments. We would go back to this place just to satisfy the cravings! Thank you! Highly Recommended!!
review 2: 35.000 IDR for small piece of fried chicken and rice without any veggies. Definitely got charged more than locals sitting there at 9pm.

name: Sewa mobil di Nusa penida island
address: Baledan, Klumpu, Kec. Nusa Penida, Kabupaten Klungkung, Bali 80771, Indonesia
review 1:
Based on pricing, I could recommend this driving tour agency, though I find their rates somewhat high. The vehicles are expertly handled, but the driver's limited grasp of English could be improved. Any assistance or information I sought from the driver met with little success, especially when inquiring about reaching the island. Instead of receiving helpful advice, a pricier fare was suggested.

For my boat transport, I turned to 12go Asia online, securing a much more reasonable deal than the agency's proposed cost.

Regarding the tours themselves, I experienced both the eastern and western ones. I found value in the western tour, which cost me 600k, but the eastern tour at 650k left much to be desired with only Diamond Beach and the Tree House as its highlights. Hence, I would recommend opting for the western tour.

The visit to Goa Giri Putri Temple, for which I paid 250k for sarong and the entry fee, did not meet my expectations. The infrastructure wasn't tourist-friendly, making it feel overpriced. The eastern tour, despite its additional 300k cost for parking and entry fees
over and above the base amount, was completed in just 3 hours.

In conclusion, if you must choose, the western tour is my recommendation. I would also advise the agency to adopt a more customer-centric approach, rather than treating customers merely as sources of revenue. Thank you, and best of luck for your future services.
review 2: Good place , nice view ,friendly guide next time will coming again,driver handsome üòçüòç
review 3: Great driver for nusa penida! Happily assisted us!
review 4: Good place , nice view üòç friendly guide next time will coming again
